title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, fry pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan together.
Drain pasta and combine with pancetta, then remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg mixture and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato-based gravy.
ingredients: Salt and garam masala to taste
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until golden.
In a pan, saut√© onions until soft, then add tomato puree.
Stir in cream and garam masala, then simmer.
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 more minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple, delicious avocado toast topped with eggs, tomatoes, and chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash the avocado with salt and pepper.
Spread avocado on the toast and top with sliced tomatoes.
Add a fried egg on top if desired.
Sprinkle chili flakes and serve immediately.
